Issue.creator: sykesm
Issue.summary: Informational messages from HandleChaincodeDeploy are not user friendly
Issue.description: INFO 046 Channel testchannel : Chaincode Name=marbles, Version=0.0, Hash= byte{0xc6, 0x9b, 0xa4 , 0xd2, 0x9d, 0xda, 0xf2, 0x24, 0x69, 0x74, 0x9b, 0x1b, 0x6c, 0x5f, 0x84, 0xfa, 0xe, 0x7, 0x26, 0xf, 0x31, 0xdb, 0x39, 0x46, 0xb8, 0xb6, 0x1f, 0xd0, 0xd5, 0xa9, 0x55, 0xd4} is not installed hence no need to create chaincode artifacts for endorsement {code} and {code} e Org1.peer1 2019-10-30 15:46:38.605 UTC cceventmgmt HandleChaincodeDeploy -> INFO 05e Channel testchannel : Chaincode Name=marbles, Version=0.0, Hash= byte{0xc6, 0x9b, 0xa4 , 0xd2, 0x9d, 0xda, 0xf2, 0x24, 0x69, 0x74, 0x9b, 0x1b, 0x6c, 0x5f, 0x84, 0xfa, 0xe, 0x7, 0x26, 0xf, 0x31, 0xdb, 0x39, 0x46, 0xb8, 0xb6, 0x1f, 0xd0, 0xd5, 0xa9, 0x55, 0xd4} is not installed hence no need to create chaincode artifacts for endorsement {code} >
